pkgmetadata.longdescription: This tree contains a copy of libfdt from the upstream dtc project for thepurposes of pypi.org packaging. Other than changes to the packaging files,changes should be made upstream. The upstream sources are here:git://git.kernel.org/pub/scm/utils/dtc/dtc.gitTo install this you will need to install swig and Python development files.On Debian distributions: sudo apt-get install swig python3-devThe module can be installed with pip: pip install libfdtor via setup.py: ./setup.py install [--user]
